# Code of Conduct

This project follows the Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct (version 2.1).

Please read the full policy in the repository root: /CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md

Reporting
---------
If you experience or witness behavior that violates the Code of Conduct, please contact the project maintainers at: repo-maintainers@local

You may also open a private issue on GitHub and mark it as sensitive.

Enforcement
-----------
Project maintainers will review reports and take appropriate action. The maintainers' decisions are final.

Thank you for helping keep this community welcoming and inclusive.
